actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to make public the financial reports of common carriers by water in interstate commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to require annual, periodic, or special financial reports from common carriers by water in interstate commerce. Requires that such reports be preserved as public records.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Intercoastal Shipping Act, 1933, to make public the financial reports of common carriers by water in interstate commerce.
